sentence: In March 2021, Twitter temporarily restricted Ohio U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel in Match for violating the social media platform's rules.
author: Charlotte Trattner
title: Ohio Bill Could Make It Easier to Sue Social Media Companies Over Censorship

sentence: pic.twitter.com/6zG0ubtqf1 — Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) February 21, 2022 In his post, Mandel included an image of a screenshot of the notice he received from Facebook, which read, “You can’t post or comment for 24 hours,” because, “you previously posted something that didn’t follow our Community Standards.” “This post goes against our standards on hate speech, so only you can see it,” the message from Facebook added.
author: Alana Mastrangelo
title: Facebook Drops ‘Hate Speech’ Suspension for OH GOP Candidate Josh Mandel

sentence: Don’t you suck up to him.” The second Josh Mandel v. Morgan Harper debate is going completely off the rails pic.twitter.com/DtZJZxmK40 — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 Promoted Content Mandel is just openly insulting Harper at this debate, to groans pic.twitter.com/YANuVOJn9X — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 After a debate in which Mandel called Harper dumb and scolded her for being “angry” about a dozen times, Harper refuses to shake his hand pic.twitter.com/yTuvfYDGzm — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 The full debate is in the video below: Harper posted a video message on Tuesday, blasting Mandel, calling him a sexist and a racist.
author: DML News App
title: VIDEO: Debate erupts into chaos as Republican compares Dem to ‘dumber’ AOC

sentence: pic.twitter.com/a335TivWh6 — Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) March 7, 2022 He urged political observers to read about Wisconsin’s investigation of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s funding of election operations in 2020, ostensibly “to ensure voters could cast their ballots safely and securely.” Wisconsin state Special Counsel Michael Gableman said $8.8 million worth of funding from Zuckerberg is considered election bribery in the Badger State.
author: Robert Kraychik
title: Exclusive— Josh Mandel: ‘Big Tech Oligarchs’ Like Mark Zuckerberg Must Be Criminally Investigated

sentence: (Josh Mandel for U.S. Senate) Fred Davis, a Republican consultant who creates ads for Mandel, told PolitiFact that the version of the image that showed up in the ad reflected efforts by the video editor to make sure the text directing viewers to the campaign’s "JoshMandel.com" web address showed up on the video.
author: Bill McCarthy
title: No evidence Josh Mandel photoshopped his face onto body of Black Marine for campaign ad
